name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Clap three times for youth" 
On March 12, Shanxi University Affiliated Middle School held a Tai Chi competition. The school leaders were dissatisfied because the students applauded the last-ranked class. The school leaders criticized the applauding students and asked them to go on stage. Then some students went on stage to confront. During the process, they said that although the results were not good, we practiced and we were proud so we applauded. 
Afterwards, the students posted posters on the notice board. After being torn down, more posters were posted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Iran officially launches attack on Israel
About half an hour ago, Iran's suicide drone swarm began to move towards Israel and is currently passing over Iraq.
The drone swarm is expected to arrive in Israel in a few hours (between 6:30 and 7:30 tomorrow morning)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, Iran's drone swarm is still on its way to Israel. However, Iran's mission to the United Nations said that "the matter can be considered over." The attack was a response to Israel's previous attack on the Iranian embassy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 13, a knife attack occurred in front of the gate of Dalian University of Technology. It was said that the two people were from the society, not students, and the cause of the incident was an emotional dispute.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the media reported that in Jinan, Shandong.
On the evening of March 31, three drunks entered the Jinan Electronic Mechanical Engineering School and pretended to be deliverymen to tease a female student. Three boys stepped forward to stop them. During the process, a boy fought back after being strangled by the drunk, causing the other party to fall to the ground and hit his head, and was diagnosed with brain hernia.
The next day, the student was detained by Jinan police on suspicion of intentional injury.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 14, Fuzhou, Jiangxi. A car accelerated and crashed into a vehicle in the opposite lane that was waiting for the red light. The accident caused 1 death and 5 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 13, Suqian, Jiangsu. The owner of a FAW-Volkswagen 4S store in Sucheng District ran away, and the car owner went to the store to defend his rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 12, in Xi'an, Shaanxi, an old man broke down and knelt down to beg tourists who were out to enjoy the flowers in the spring not to trample on his vegetable field, but the tourists beside him ignored him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 14, Xinhua News Agency reported a "typical case of an overseas anti-China party luring college students to participate in activities".
The article stated that in recent years, overseas anti-China hostile forces have used the Internet and other channels to carry out ideological "psychological warfare" against domestic personnel, distorting and hyping domestic hot events, and attacking and slandering our political system. A very small number of young students were incited and deceived, accidentally fell into the trap, and became "chess pieces" of overseas anti-China hostile forces.
Recently, the national security agency successfully cracked a typical case of an overseas anti-China party luring a college student to participate in an activity, effectively cracking down on the infiltration and subversion activities of overseas anti-China forces, and promptly eliminating risks and hidden dangers. In their work, the national security agency learned that Song, a student at a domestic college, signed up online out of curiosity and received relevant instructions sent to him by the core members of an overseas organization. Song also browsed overseas anti-China websites for a long time and provided negative image materials related to China to relevant websites.
2023...
fullContent:
4月14日，新华社报道一起“境外反华政党拉拢高校学生参与活动的典型案例”
文中称，近年来，境外反华敌对势力利用互联网等渠道对境内人员开展意识形态“攻心战”，歪曲炒作境内热点事件，攻击诋毁我政治制度。极少数青年学生受到煽动蛊惑，不慎落入陷阱，成为境外反华敌对势力的“棋子”。
日前，国家安全机关成功侦破了一起境外反华政党拉拢某高校学生参与活动的典型案件，有力打击了境外反华势力的渗透策反活动，及时消除了风险隐患。国家安全机关在工作中掌握到，国内某高校学生宋某出于猎奇心理，通过网络报名，接收境外某组织核心成员向其发送的有关指令。宋某还长期浏览境外反华网站，并为相关网站提供涉华负面影像素材。
2023年7月，国家安全机关依法对宋某进行行政询问，根据《中华人民共和国反间谍法》相关规定，予以宋某警告并出具行政处罚决定书。经批评教育，宋某对自己的行为表达了诚恳悔过，承诺今后不再从事类似活动。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 14, Chang'an Town, Dongguan, Guangdong. Peng'an Driving School was exposed to have its boss fleeing, and students gathered outside the driving school to defend their rights that day

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 12, a netizen posted that he had donated blood 13 times in the past decade, totaling 4,900 milliliters, and had won the National Bronze Award for Free Blood Donation.
However, on April 10, his wife had surgery at Shandong Qilu Hospital, and blood was needed before the surgery. The hospital notified that she had to donate blood before the blood could be prepared. The netizen showed the hospital the blood donation record, but the hospital said that the blood she donated in Rizhao City could not be used in Jinan City.
The netizen contacted the Rizhao Blood Station for coordination, and it said it would coordinate at first, but in the end it didn't even answer the phone, and there was no response until the end of the surgery.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Before there was Blood Trough Sister, now there is Blood Bag Brother

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many Chongqing citizens have reported online that since their homes have replaced new smart gas meters, the cost of gas has increased several times compared to before. It is understood that most residents replaced their meters at the end of last year, and some replaced their meters around February this year.
On April 12, Chongqing Gas issued a clarification announcement that the company replaced the gas meters that had expired in accordance with relevant national safety and metrology verification regulations. The gas meters replaced by the company have all been qualified by the statutory metrology verification agency and have qualified verification. The company will arrange special personnel to implement the verification for the problems reported by customers. As of now, no metering inaccuracies have been found in the verified gas meters.
According to the data, Chongqing Gas's net profit in the fourth quarter of 2023 increased by 824% year-on-year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 14 (Released), several people attacked a man with knives on the streets of Chongqing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of April 14, a Porsche collided with a police car on Yucai Road in Pinghu, Zhejiang, causing serious damage to the front of the police car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 14, the Beijing Half Marathon was suspected of match-fixing, which aroused public doubts. In the video, in the last few hundred meters of the race, Chinese athlete He Jie was originally behind, but one of the three foreign athletes turned around and waved his hand, apparently signaling He Jie to overtake, and then signaled his teammates to slow down. In the end, He Jie completed the overtaking in tacit understanding and won the championship with a one-second advantage.
This dramatic scene aroused public doubts.
He Jie is currently a member of the Chinese men's marathon national team, the champion of the Hangzhou Asian Games, and the men's national record holder

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 13, in Zibo, Shandong, Lijin Group investors knelt outside the Zibo Municipal Government to defend their rights.
It is reported that Lijin Group had promised investors to transfer the money on the 13th, but in the end each person only transferred 100 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 14, Tengzhou City, Shandong Province. A minor resisted forced demolition.
The video shows that the teenager first jumped off the building while sitting on the edge of his own factory to defend his rights, and then threw stones and fireworks at the urban management officers who approached with shields. And used sticks for close combat.
But in the end, he was outnumbered and subdued by the urban management officers.
The video description said that in order to build a highway, the Dongguo Town Government forcibly demolished the factory that it had operated for 30 years without any procedures.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 13, Taiyuan, Shanxi. The Cambridge City real estate project has been unfinished for ten years and has not yet been delivered. The owners are defending their rights in front of the developer and the local government building. Some owners were taken away by the police while defending their rights outside the government building.
